betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Matter with negative mass is one of the implicit aspects of wormholes.
Within a wormhole, this type of exotic matter must exist, but it does not have to exist out here in the normal universe.
After all my progress with Warrens, though, I should be able of making it and using it.
Negative mass, negative gravity, this is what I needed, along with the eyes of a Fractallite, to fully see the final Mythic Shell as it truly is.
Space made fractal, self-similar, and forever repeating. A miracle among the laws of nature, and yet an abomination in its use as a fortress for war.
A war I will soon begin, but not yet. Other loose ends need to be addressed first.
